RT @itsmikemags: @davemcclure no problem Dave, now get the F back to work. ;)
@itsmikemags exactly.
anyway, sharing my "deep" inner thoughts + lack of self-confidence with 300,000 nerds on twitter is cheap therapy. thx 4 listening folks :)
also have to realize that for many people, my "bad day" is a walk in the fucking park, and even my worst days aren't really that bad.
really have to balance "keeping it real" vs. not being grumpy old man just bcz I'm having bad hair day or some1 cut me off in traffic.
often a fine line re: being authentic / transparent w/ people u work with, at same time aiming 2b role model 4 optimism & positive attitude
sometimes I forget my emotions & outlook cast a long shadow on others, espec those on my team... still, not easy 2b positive all the time.
sometimes I forget my emotions / outlook cast a long shadow on others, espec those on my team... still, not easy 2b positive all the time.
sigh: feeling negative about my own negativity; guess I just need to wait 4 it to pass. prefer 2 feel good about myself, others, the world.
